analysis.description:
ARXCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#182-207) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#202-205)

Reentrancy in ARXCrowdsale.fallback (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#182-207):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,rewardTransferAmount) (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#202-205)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- usersARXfundValue (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#205-206)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_fundingStartBlock' of ARXCrowdsale.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#128-129) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_fundingEndBlock' of ARXCrowdsale.SetupCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#129-130) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ARXCrowdsale.beneficiaryMultiSigWithdraw (/unique_chucks/24/0xb65e16b44a80c9c44addd56a5014cba2814a82d1.sol#208-211) is not in mixedCase
